refnamediv.refpurpose: Creation of the polyphase representation of a signal

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: X = polyphase_form(x,m); // Build polyphase matrix x = polyphase_form(X,m,-1); // Reverse transform

listitem.para: number of polyphase branches e.g. decimation ratio

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Creation of the polyphase matrix, with zero padding if necessary. First row of X is x(1), x(1+m), x(1+2m), ..., second row is x(2), x(2+m), etc.
